name: ViperFeed
author: ViperChill

sections.description:
ViperFeed adds a gorgeous footer to your RSS feed. This will be displayed for people who get your blog posts via email, or in an RSS reader like Google Reader and Bloglines. You can use this space for giveaways, encouraging comments, showing ads, or linking to other areas of your website.

ViperChill, a blog on Viral Marketing, is the creator of this plugin. If you want to take your blog to the next level, you should read this post on WordPress SEO.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ViperFeed directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the options page to make changes.
sections.faq:
How do I contact you?

Email hq@viperchill.com

Is this plugin free?

Yes.
sections.changelog:
0.9

The initial version of the plugin is ready for the masses.

1.0

Visual Tweaks

1.1

Added the ability to link the ‘breaker’ image.
Added a preview to the bottom of the options panel.
